title: projects_test
text:
Install
git clone 'git@github.com:LeeWilli/projects_test.git'
cd projects_test
python setup.py install

title: projects_test
text:
How to use

启动 jupyter notebook.

jupyter notebook
如果没有可以安装
pip install jupyter

测试心率等生理指标 打开’01_heart.ipynb’,修改video_path为所要测试视频，再全部执行。

title: Notebook Best Practices
Notebook Best Practices
text:
All together

class MyArray(np.ndarray):
    def all(self, axis=None, out=None):
        ...


x = [[True, False], [True, True]]
y = MyArray((2, 2))
y[:] = x
np.all(y)  # No TypeError since `keepdims` isn't passed
test_fail(
    lambda: np.all(y, keepdims=True),
    contains="all() got an unexpected keyword argument 'keepdims'",
)



say_hello

 say_hello (to)

Say hello to somebody

say_hello("Isaac")

'Hello Isaac!'
